name: Shellshocked IV
description:
Shellshocked IV

Shellshocked is a Top Down World of Tanks Inspired Arcade Game!

with minimalistic controls, and simple Gameplay, this game will let you shoot some enemys and enjoy a short break from whatever ur upto

Split Screen modes! play with ur friends on the same machine!

the game was canceled when we started a larger even better project, so we compiled what we had made so far, and output it
